review: A cheap alternative to other streaming products. I currently own a Roku 2 box and this product. I purchased the Chromecast for simple YouTube viewing on my TV. It gets the job done.As a whole, this product is much more compatible with Android devices. You can stream most video outside of Chromecast approved apps on an Android device.If you're a heavy Mac user like me, you would be better off with an Apple TV. However, if you're looking for a cheaper option, this device works well and is incredibly easy to use.
author: Bjar

review: I have 2 apple tv's and this chromecast. The chromecast is cool because it is a little bigger than a standard usb dongle. It's somewhat limited because you need a pc, mac, ipad or smart phone and a wifi connection in order to be able to stream something on your tv. But it's great for business trips and stuff like that.
